messages.content:
Parse the content provided by the user to determine modules in a system

- (dash) defines the module
/ (slash) defines a comment

You MUST response in JSON, scheme
[{name:string, value:string, comment:string}]

name: name of module
type: native|.net|python|javascript
comment: create description of the module
Be concise

Native modules:
- WindowAppModule
- WebserverModule - Start webserver, write to Body, Header, Cookie
- TerminalModule - Terminal/Console access to run external applications
- SeleniumModule - Run a browser instance, browse a website, input values and extract content
- ScheduleModule - Sleep and time delay. Cron scheduler
- PythonModule - Runs python scripts. Parameters can be passed, parameterNames should be equal length as parameterValues. Parameter example name=%name%
- OutputModule - Outputs and writes out, to the UI a text or a variable
- MessageModule - Send and recieve private messages using Nostr protocol
- LoopModule - While, for, foreach, loops through a list
- LocalOrGlobalVariableModule - Set & Get local and static variables. Bind events to variable.
- LlmModule - Ask LLM a question and recieve and answer
- ListDictionaryModule - Add, update, delete and retrieve variables to and from a list or dictionary. It can be local variable or static/global
- HttpModule - Make Http request
- HtmlModule
- FileModule - Handle file system access
- EnvironmentSettingsModule - Various settings for the program, such as culture, date & number formatting
- DbModule - Database access, select, insert, update, delete and execute raw sql. Handles transactions
- CryptographicModule - Encrypt, descryption and hashing & verify using bcrypt, compute Sha256Hash, generate & validate Bearer token
- ConditionalModule - Manages if conditions for the user request. Example 1:'if %isValid% is true then', this condition would return true if %isValid% is true. Example 2:'if %address% is empty then', this would check if the %address% variable is empty and return true if it is, else false.
- CodeModule - Generate c# code from user description. Only use if no other module is found
- CallGoalModule - Call another Goal, when ! is prefixed, e.g. !RenameFile
- BlockchainModule - Use blockchain, create wallet, account info, transfer money, sign message, verify signature

[
  {"name": "WindowAppModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Native module for managing window applications"},
  {"name": "WebserverModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Start webserver, write to Body, Header, Cookie"},
  {"name": "TerminalModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Terminal/Console access to run external applications"},
  {"name": "SeleniumModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Run a browser instance, browse a website, input values and extract content"},
  {"name": "ScheduleModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Sleep and time delay. Cron scheduler"},
  {"name": "PythonModule", "type": "python", "comment": "Runs python scripts. Parameters can be passed, parameterNames should be equal length as parameterValues. Parameter example name=%name%"},
  {"name": "OutputModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Outputs and writes out, to the UI a text or a variable"},
  {"name": "MessageModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Send and recieve private messages using Nostr protocol"},
  {"name": "LoopModule", "type": "native", "comment": "While, for, foreach, loops through a list"},
  {"name": "LocalOrGlobalVariableModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Set & Get local and static variables. Bind events to variable."},
  {"name": "LlmModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Ask LLM a question and recieve and answer"},
  {"name": "ListDictionaryModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Add, update, delete and retrieve variables to and from a list or dictionary. It can be local variable or static/global"},
  {"name": "HttpModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Make Http request"},
  {"name": "HtmlModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Module for handling HTML content"},
  {"name": "FileModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Handle file system access"},
  {"name": "EnvironmentSettingsModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Various settings for the program, such as culture, date & number formatting"},
  {"name": "DbModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Database access, select, insert, update, delete and execute raw sql. Handles transactions"},
  {"name": "CryptographicModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Encrypt, descryption and hashing & verify using bcrypt, compute Sha256Hash, generate & validate Bearer token"},
  {"name": "ConditionalModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Manages if conditions for the user request. Example 1:'if %isValid% is true then', this condition would return true if %isValid% is true. Example 2:'if %address% is empty then', this would check if the %address% variable is empty and return true if it is, else false."},
  {"name": "CodeModule", "type": ".net", "comment": "Generate c# code from user description. Only use if no other module is found"},
  {"name": "CallGoalModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Call another Goal, when ! is prefixed, e.g. !RenameFile"},
  {"name": "BlockchainModule", "type": "native", "comment": "Use blockchain, create wallet, account info, transfer money, sign message, verify signature"}
]

- (dash) defines the module
/ (slash) defines a comment

[{name:string, value:string, comment:string}]

name: name of module
type: native|.net|python|javascript
comment: create description of the module
